com.devtence.will.dev.models.commons

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.models.BaseModel<Configuration>
      • com.devtence.will.dev.models.commons.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Configuration
extends BaseModel<Configuration>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that models the Configuration data and map it's structure to the persistence layer, it also defines and implements the functions that can be performed with the Configurations.

    This objects are used on the ConfigurationCache

    Since:
    2015-03-16
    Author:
    plessmann
    See Also:
    ConfigurationsCache, Serialized Form
